============
Requirements
============

The LinkedIn Data Gather (LIDG) script requires a few things to be installed on your system, specifically:

#. `MongoDB <http://www.mongodb.org/>`_
#. `pyMongo <http://api.mongodb.org/python/current/>`_
#. `BeautifulSoup4 <http://www.crummy.com/software/BeautifulSoup/>`_

Standard library features that LIDG uses include:

#. `sys <http://docs.python.org/2/library/sys.html>`_
#. `urllib2 <http://docs.python.org/2/library/urllib2.html>`_
#. `time <http://docs.python.org/2/library/time.html>`_

---------------
Recommendations
---------------

I highly recommend installing Anaconda from Continuum Analytics. It contains many python libraries for data mining and analytics. It's also super easy to install.

`Download it here <https://store.continuum.io/cshop/anaconda/>`_
